name: api-test-automation
description: Automação de testes de API para gerenciamento de usuários usando Postman/Newman

scripts.test: newman run postman/collection.json -e postman/environment.json -r cli,html,json,junit --reporter-html-export reports/html/report.html --reporter-json-export reports/json/report.json --reporter-junit-export reports/junit/report.xml
scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['reports', 'reports/html', 'reports/json', 'reports/junit'].forEach(dir => !fs.existsSync(dir) && fs.mkdirSync(dir, {recursive: true})); console.log('Build completed: Reports directories created');"
scripts.validate: node -e "try { JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('postman/collection.json', 'utf8')); console.log('Collection is valid'); } catch(e) { console.error('Invalid collection:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
